segment.source: Use the Details window to view detailed information about the issue selected in the Issues window, along with recommended solutions.
segment.target: Use the Details window to view detailed information about the issue selected in the Issues window, along with recommended solutions.

segment.source: If your recording was not made with the Assessment Platform, this window is closed by default because there is no data to display.
segment.target: If your recording was not made with the Assessment Platform, this window is closed by default because there is no data to display.

segment.source: The details in this window can serve as a starting point for your investigation, or you can implement the recommended solutions directly.
segment.target: The details in this window can serve as a starting point for your investigation, or you can implement the recommended solutions directly.

segment.source: The Assisted Diagnostics section at the bottom of the Analysis tab also contains information about all issues listed in the Issues window.
segment.target: The Assisted Diagnostics section at the bottom of the Analysis tab also contains information about all issues listed in the Issues window.

segment.source: You can detach this window and drag it anywhere on your desktop, or resize or close it.
segment.target: You can detach this window and drag it anywhere on your desktop, or resize or close it.

segment.source: To dock it, drag it to any of the docking points at the top, bottom, or right or left sides of the UI until the area is highlighted.
segment.target: To dock it, drag it to any of the docking points at the top, bottom, or right or left sides of the UI until the area is highlighted.

segment.source: If this window is not open, click Details on the Window menu.
segment.target: If this window is not open, click Details on the Window menu.
